div.h2: Handwriting Recognition and Machine Learning Engineer, Frameworks

li.title: Santa Clara Valley, California, United States

ul.li: Santa Clara Valley, California, United States

div.p: Are you interested in building products that leverage machine learning and pattern recognition algorithms? Are you looking to apply your state-of-the-art knowledge to produce features like Scribble for watchOS or Markup for iOS and macOS? The Core Recognition team is looking for an exceptional engineer to help develop its next generation of machine learning and handwriting recognition solutions.

ul.li: Significant experience developing handwriting recognition systems
Expertise in modern machine learning algorithms
Experience with pattern recognition or computer vision algorithms
Strong programming, debugging and design skills
Ability to manage several concurrent projects
Ability to work independently and with others
Excellent problem solving, critical thinking and communication skills
Ability to produce creative and innovative solutions to hard problems

div.p: The Core Recognition team is looking for a candidate with exceptional experience developing modern handwriting solutions. We are seeking an engineer who will be responsible for prototyping new features, contributing to the overall design and architecture of future components and improving existing codebases. Ideal candidates must have significant experience and low-level knowledge of handwriting recognition systems. Expertise in offline and online handwriting analysis, neural networks and other statistical pattern recognition systems as well as experience managing large datasets is a plus.
Ph.D. or MA in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, or a closely related field.
